title: Impeachment testimonies break down Trump’s Ukraine call defense
text: The administration’s arguments defending that so-called “perfect call” between President Trump and President Zelensky seem to be falling apart one by one. President of the Washington Strategy Group Joel Rubin, Washington Post White House Bureau Chief Philip Rucker, Washington Post White House Correspondent Anne Gearan, and New York Times Opinion Columnist Bret Stephens join Stephanie Ruhle to discuss the latest Trump defense that’s been broken down and what we can expect from the next few testimonies.
